ViewObject.Name: ODCustSalesTeamAccessesVO
ViewObject.SQLQuery: SELECT update_flag from ( SELECT nvl(full_access_flag, 'Y') update_flag FROM XX_TM_NAM_TERR_CURR_ASSIGN_V CURR_ACC, HZ_PARTY_SITES HZPS WHERE CURR_ACC.entity_type = 'PARTY_SITE' and HZPS.party_site_id = CURR_ACC.entity_id and nvl(HZPS.identifying_address_flag,'N') = 'Y' and HZPS.status = 'A' and HZPS.party_id = :asnreqfrmcustid AND CURR_ACC.resource_id = :loginresourceid UNION SELECT 'N' update_flag FROM XX_TM_NAM_TERR_CURR_ASSIGN_V CURR_ACC, HZ_PARTY_SITES HZPS WHERE CURR_ACC.entity_type = 'PARTY_SITE' and HZPS.party_site_id = CURR_ACC.entity_id and nvl(HZPS.identifying_address_flag,'N') = 'N' and HZPS.status = 'A' and HZPS.party_id = :asnreqfrmcustid AND CURR_ACC.resource_id = :loginresourceid ) order by update_flag desc
